title: baseMap
description: The basemap provides geographic context to the map and scene.

baseMapLayers.description: An array of baseMapLayer objects defining the basemaps used in the web scene.

elevationLayers.description: Deprecated, use `ground.layers` instead 1. An array of elevationLayer objects defining the basemaps used in the web scene.

id.description: A unique identifying string for the basemap.

title.description: Required string title for the basemap that can be used in a table of contents.

examples.description: Live sample web scene showing the Imagery with Labels as a [baseMap](https://www.arcgis.com/home/webscene/viewer.html?webscene=5a57ef09b11f4cefbe317cdaf1cd31a2)
